com.pgmacdesign.pgmacutilities.utilities

Class L

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pgmacdesign.pgmacutilities.utilities.L

  • public class L
extends java.lang.Object
    Simplistic class. Used primarily for logs, toasts, and OTHER tedious things Created by pmacdowell on 8/12/2016.

      • writeToOutput

        public static <E> void writeToOutput(E myObject)
        Write data to a text file with data. The name of the file is debugLoggingData and its location is under the downloads section of the phone's memory (/storage/emulated/0/Download/). Maxes out at 5mb (which is enormous for a text file)
        Type Parameters:
        E - Extends Object
        Parameters:
        myObject - String to print

      • toast

        public static <E> void toast(Context context,
                             E myObject)
        Short toast
        Parameters:
        context - context
        myObject - String to print (If OTHER things are passed in, it converts it to a String first)

      • Toast

        public static <E> void Toast(Context context,
                             E myObject,
                             int length)
        Long toast. Overloaded to include option to alter length
        Parameters:
        context - context
        myObject - String to print (If OTHER things are passed in, it converts it to a String first)
